short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn philosophy and incorporate it into your day without even trying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn philosophy without actively setting aside time and energy to do so.  Each new tab opened in Chrome will feature an inspiring wisdom from Marcus Aurelius, the ancient Roman Emperor and renowned Stoic philosopher.  New quotations appear every 24 hours.
